attributes.action: help get the acts for disabled people looked at again and profide more help and understanding
attributes.additional_details: hi  im trying to raise awareness of disabilitys and how the acts come into effect and try and get more help out there as there is not much i cant do it alone would be greatfull if you agree then sign lets make a change and help people with disabilitys

rejection.details: Your petition should include a request for the Government to take a specific action.
